title: George Freeman – 2022 Comments on Fracking Vote
author: admin
summary: The comments made by George Freeman, the Conservative MP for Mid Norfolk, on Twitter on 19 October 2022.
content:
To be clear on fracking. I remain: 
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence

100% committed to our 2019 Manifesto on which I was elected
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence

100% committed to AONB protections
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence

reassured by clear Minister commitment that fracking will only happen w local consent and a vote in House.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence

So no need to lose the Whip tonight.

  *[UN]: United Nations
